snippet: Citing a lack of evidence, a federal judge in Florida on Thursday dismissed terrorism support and conspiracy charges against the younger of two Muslim clerics accused of funneling thousands of dollars to the Pakistani Taliban.
abstract: Federal Judge Robert N Scola Jr dismisses terrorism support and conspiracy charges against Izhar Khan, younger of two Muslim clerics accused of funneling thousands of dollars to Pakistani Taliban; case against Khan's father Hafiz is continuing.
lead_paragraph: Citing a lack of evidence, a federal judge in Florida on Thursday dismissed terrorism support and conspiracy charges against the younger of two Muslim clerics accused of funneling thousands of dollars to the Pakistani Taliban.
